docs.snippet: NEW HAVEN, Conn., Dec. 10. -- Many of the leading amateur cracks competed in the indoor games of the Sarsfield Guard at the Second Regiment Armory this evening. Tom Collins of New York made a splendid showing in the three-mile run, winning it from...
docs.lead_paragraph: NEW HAVEN, Conn., Dec. 10. -- Many of the leading amateur cracks competed in the indoor games of the Sarsfield Guard at the Second Regiment Armory this evening. Tom Collins of New York made a splendid showing in the three-mile run, winning it from scratch in 14 minutes 48 1-5 seconds.

headline.main: COLLINS MAKES FAST TIME.; New York Athletes Sweep the Boards at New Haven Meet.

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

headline.main: STEAMER SAVES 28 LIVES.; Were Aboard Vessel Wrecked on the Coast of Uruguay.
